content: **knitted mittens with cables and textured pattern the piece is worked in drops karisma ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no u-828 yarn group b ----------------------------------------------------------- sizes s/m - l/xl materials drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100 g for both sizes in color 01 off white the piece can also be knitted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group b see link below drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm / us 4 or the size needed to get 22 stitches and 30 row stockinette stitch on 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 in height drops double pointed needles size 3 mm / us 2 5 for rib - or the size needed to get 23 stitches and 32 row stockinette stitch on 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 in height drops cable needle - for the cables
